name: @retend/monorepo
description: A modern reactive framework for fluid, dynamic web apps.
author: Adebola Akomolafe

scripts.publish-core: cd packages/retend && bun run build && bun publish
scripts.publish-ssg: cd packages/retend-server && bun run build && bun publish
scripts.publish-all: bun run publish-core && bun run publish-ssg && bun run publish-start
scripts.previews: cp README.md packages/retend/README.md && npx pkg-pr-new publish './packages/retend' './packages/retend-server' './packages/retend-start'
